How many distinct four-tuples $ (a,b,c,d)$ of rational numbers are there with\\
\\
$ a \log_{10} 2 + b \log_{10} 3 + c \log_{10} 5 + d \log_{10} 7 = 2005$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 0\qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 1\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 17\qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 2004\qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{infinitely many}$
